trans-unit.target: Define um plano de comando armazenável em cache.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandDefinition> class is used by the Entity Framework and is not intended for use as a stand-alone component.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandDefinition> classe é usada pelo Entity Framework e não se destina para uso como um componente autônomo.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbCommandDefinition" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbCommandDefinition" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbCommandDefinition" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbCommandDefinition" />.

trans-unit.source: The default constructor is used by classes that derive from <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandDefinition>.
trans-unit.target: O construtor padrão é usado por classes que derivam de <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandDefinition>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbCommandDefinition" /> class using the supplied <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbCommand" />.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbCommandDefinition" /> usando o <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbCommand" /> fornecido.

trans-unit.source: The supplied <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand> must implement <xref:System.ICloneable>; otherwise a <xref:System.Data.ProviderIncompatibleException> is raised.
trans-unit.target: Fornecido <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand> deve implementar <xref:System.ICloneable>; caso contrário, um <xref:System.Data.ProviderIncompatibleException> é gerado.

trans-unit.source: This constructor is used by classes that derive from <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandDefinition>.
trans-unit.target: Este construtor é usado por classes que derivam de <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandDefinition>.

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns a <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbCommand" /> object that can be executed.
trans-unit.target: Cria e retorna um objeto <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbCommand" /> que pode ser executado.
O comando do banco de dados.
